channel.title: Pvp is running out of hand
channel.description:
a group raided haven and took all of our stuff please make haven a no pvp area
EDIT: please make us able to choose at start of game if we want to enable pvp or not
this way you can have a builder account and a pvp account sharing stuff can happen with chest's and /lwc -c private otherguyname
people who enable pvp can't attack players with pvp on and in reverse too
sorry reyx7 i wont do it again :)

item.title: Pvp is running out of hand
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:28, topic:379715”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=475556.msg3478723#msg3478723 date=1295914320]

Hehe, getting your britches to defend you

Pants don’t provide very good protection.
[/quote]
Of course they do! Unless your one of those freaks that go out in the cold with briefs or shorts.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp is running out of hand
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

xxx123xxx:

lol your pretty dumb aren’t you, well let me dumb this down for you. You duH Griefed dUh My duH House duh and duh killed me Duh Twice DUH. So i dont know why you arnt getting it into your thick little brain of yours. duhh…

No, you’re pretty dumb. He clearly said you boxed yourself in, and he did minimal damage, which is allowed if you knew how to read. He repaired it also.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp is running out of hand
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

look i do not want anyone banned anymore but just make players be able to choose: always pvp or no pvp for themselves

OR

Make city’s non-pvp

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp is running out of hand
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:19, topic:379715”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=475556.msg3477602#msg3477602 date=1295821554]

Lol reyx7 u went inside my house, griefed my walls, took my cobble. Twice. Your just a douche, face that fact you prick.

Lol?
I entered your city, killed your people and took their items. I don’t grief.
[/quote]

Lol your pretty dumb aren’t you, i don’t have a city, you griefed my house you retard.[/quote]

Ohhh hahaha you.

You boxed yourself in a wall. I broke 2 blocks, killed you, and closed the wall.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp is running out of hand
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

k0 twin:

I don’t see how it’s “running out of hand”, just that you don’t like PvP. Some do, many don’t.

Exactly.
Just build bigger, thinker walls.
If u use 5 layers of cobblestone or obsidian I’ll be like “fuck that I’m leaving”

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp is running out of hand
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:8, topic:379715”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=475556.msg3477532#msg3477532 date=1295818562]

It’s too bad the PVP lovers are attacking the players that want to build only.

Makes much more sense if these PVP lovers just formed separate factions and fought each

other.
[/quote]Too much of a pussy for that, they prefer to kill non equiped builders who don’t stand a chance.

I got an idea we carry lava bow and arrows sword flint and steel and food and fight back!!! See how they like it[/quote]
Thank you, that’s exactly what we want.

Read full topic
item.source: Pvp is running out of hand

item.title: Pvp is running out of hand
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:

It’s too bad the PVP lovers are attacking the players that want to build only.

Makes much more sense if these PVP lovers just formed separate factions and fought each
other.
[/quote]Too much of a pussy for that, they prefer to kill non equiped builders who don’t stand a chance.

I got an idea we carry lava bow and arrows sword flint and steel and food and fight back!!! See how they like it

Defeats the idea of being a neutral builder who dislikes PVP in all varieties.[/quote]

Maybe they will learn how annoying it gets when they lose their stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp is running out of hand
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:4, topic:379715”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=475556.msg3477518#msg3477518 date=1295817717]
It’s too bad the PVP lovers are attacking the players that want to build only.

Makes much more sense if these PVP lovers just formed separate factions and fought each other.
[/quote]
I like the constant fear.And I’ve found time to build. They’re just close to spawn.[/quote]

I only say this is because I allowed my attackers when I owned Varrock to kill me because I was a completely neutral force. Yet they still found it fun to come back and attack. I was completely neutral, even after being attacked, yet was still a big target because of Varrock’s popularity.

Read full topic
item.source: Pvp is running out of hand
